text:
Ted Cruz gave a press conference a few minutes ago on the new deal announced last night between he and Kasich in allocating their resources in certain states. One thing that is clear now is this is only a deal about recourses, not about telling voters to vote for the other candidate in certain states.

Watch the full press conference below:

[wpvideo cPDgZniT w=755]

[wpvideo bty8SC7c w=755]
